description: Extension and refurbishment of existing health and fitness club to provide new gymnasium, extended swimming pool and associated facilities including changing rooms and cafe; provision of 3 no. padel courts; new outdoor play area; upgraded community hall, and other associated works. Installation of pv solar panels.

open_spaces_details.description:
Please refer to open space and land use page within the document reference "1000-The River Club Landscape Design & Access Statement"

This details all area of Loss, Gain and Change
open_spaces_details.open_space_type: Outdoor sports facilities incl. school playing fields
